name: Sony Walkman NW-E394
description: This lightweight Walkman can play MP3s for long hours between charges, and with a simple drag and drop interface it's easy to load up all your music. The easy-to-use controls let you find the right song, view photos and tune the radio in seconds..
type: 1.7 in x 0.4 in x 3.6 in; 1.38 oz; WMA, AAC, MP3, LPCM JPEG

name: Universal 16gb Mp4 Player
description: This is a great option as it has many great features for a reasonable cost.
type: 16gb Mp4 Player FM Radio Video Games Movie

name: Sandisk 8GB Clip Jam MP3 Player
description: The bright one inch screen and big navigation buttons make it easy to drag and drop pictures.
type: 0.6 x 1.6 x 2.6 inches; 0.6 ounces; comes with 8 GB (1) of storage

name: iPod Shuffle
description: The smallest model in Apple's iPod family, and was the first to use flash memory.
type: The clickable control pad on the front of iPod shuffle makes it easy to see and use the music controls.
